Detailed Description

This class is used to stream data off a memory block.

const void * MemoryIStream::retrieve ( int  nBytes  )  [inline, virtual]

This method retrieves the input number of bytes from this stream.

The returned data is still owned by the stream, so the caller is not responsible for freeing it.

Parameters:
nBytes Number of bytes to retrieve.
Returns:
Pointer to returned data.

Implements BinaryIStream.
